attributes.action: encourage people to pay TV licence by direct debit, by fixing the monthly payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, actual direct debit payments can change up to four times a year, because unlike most utility bills, TV Licencing payments are based on a complex system of arrears and credits rather than a payment fixed for 12 months

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
